website_summaries.verdict: Hard to tell whether this oversized unicorn is better as a fun sprinkler or amazing photo prop. Size lends itself to bigger kids.
pros: Enormous 6-foot unicorn sprays water from its horn
cons: Some had trouble keeping the unicorn inflated
A few reports of ripped seams

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive? WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: This was bought on a whim because I love Stranger Things so much. The price tag was a bit much, but honestly it was worth every penny! I have it at the back of my yard and the spray from the sprinkler reaches my pool right by house. (Roughly 25-30 feet) It is wildly fun! Tip: get something for the hose to rest on so it doesn't pull or add weight to the back of the Demogorgon.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Great for taking selfies with!
customer_reviews.text: This was literally one of the most amazing investments I've ever made. Had a big party and wanted something that would be a great item to take pictures with, and boy was I right! People loved it. I also found it super easy to blow up with a hairdryer on a cool setting. Loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan The Man

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea except defective
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our Grandson to play with. Very cool idea for kids. I just wish his right leg wasn't backwards!!! Very disappointed because I couldn't hook up the water today just in case we need to return for a replacement. I'll definitely be requesting a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Contacted the manufacturer directly because the return window had already closed. They sent me a replacement promptly. I have yet to open the new one but I am increasing my stars just for customer service alone. I love it when a company stands by their product. It was fun but it’s not durable. It popped on us as we were filling it with a little more air because it was beginning to droop. It was not a small hole but a 2 feet long seam ripped open at the neck. We only played with it for an hour before it burst. For the price I would have thought it would be more durable. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: wishwatanabe

customer_reviews.title: WASTE of money
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 5 yr old as a graduation present. This thing is one of the most annoying and high maintenance purchases ive ever made. The bottoms are weighted down so a slight breeze knocks it over constantly. The legs have to be set perfect for it to remain standing level. The horn never fills fully so it looks like a broken unicorn. And it slowly leaks air even though theres no hole. I have to tie it to something to keep it from blowing over. This is a WASTE of money and will try your patience. Dont say i didnt warn you.
customer_reviews.author: Joe scialabba

customer_reviews.title: Fun time! Wish it had wind stakes
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME!! Just wish there were straps for wind stakes. This thing flew around until I tied her up to a tree with a rope. The kids had a hoot!
customer_reviews.author: BernaBee

customer_reviews.title: Check it right out of the box.  Reports of defects and ours was too.
customer_reviews.text: This inflatable water toy is so cute, but arrived with a HOLE already in it! The kids were so excited to use it that we used the patch and put it up. One star for the lack of quality control. Also found this product much cheaper at Target after the fact. I suppose it pays to do your homework. A hole in one from Target could have been easily corrected. Not sure how long it will last, really regretting having overpaid for something defective right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after the first use
customer_reviews.text: Came undone at the neck after the first use. Just opened up. Which is a shame cause it is a fun and cute item. I would otherwise give it 5 stars if it was quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Quick & easy to setup if you have an air pump. Comes with small patch. Multiple water streams shoot wide and far! It is pricy for what it is - same quality as an inflatable pool float. I used a quick-connect for the hose hookup and an outside chair for support (highly recommend supporting the hose connection so the inflatable doesn’t tear). Looks great, it’s fun, and the family loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Check to make sure there are no tears immediately
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed we bought this for my sons dinosaur birthday party for the end of May. I bought it mid March as I like to be prepared. However I didn’t try to inflate it prior to the party assuming it was new and it shouldn’t have issues. I went to blow it up and it had a HUGE tear under the trex jaw line. There was absolutely no way to patch that. And because it is past the deadline I cannot exchange it for a new one or get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: J Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, less than 4 hours
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely garbage. Lasted a total of 4 hours before tears happened at the rear stake flap where it has a seam with the tail and one of the leg stake flaps at the seam. There's no reinforcement there whatsoever so it is prone to tear. Didn't inflate it too much, no high winds and no one ran into it. Because of where the tear happened the repair strip wouldn't work. Such a letdown. The idea is awesome, but the execution is terrible. Many people have been talking about these on social media, we'll be sharing our frustration with anyone who will listen. Waste of $50.
customer_reviews.author: DrAwkwArD

customer_reviews.title: Roaring good time
customer_reviews.text: This thing was awesome. A hit at our dino themed birthday party... a few suggestions... 1) figure out how to add some weight to his feet.. he kept tipping over. 2) a carrying case? Because its impossible to put back in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley D

customer_reviews.title: Blows up quick, deflated quicker.
customer_reviews.text: Blew up easily and quickly. However after less than 20 minutes of use the dinosaur was no longer standing tall and was unable to be at its full 6 foot height. Even when repumping it wouldn’t reinflate to its full size.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Bad seals
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 7 weeks. Pathetic. Lost a little air after a storm. Attempted to reinflate, and the front seam under the “jaw” of the dinosaur gave out. Now I get to explain to my kids how their dinosaur went extinct.
customer_reviews.author: David Booker

customer_reviews.title: Cute for kids
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully this will be a big hit with my grandkids who love anything dinosaurs. It was a little more difficult to inflate than expected but it’s been 2 days and it hasn’t lost any air.
customer_reviews.author: MGF

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: Make no mistake, this is expensive but the kids absolutely love it. I took a previous reviewers advice and made sure to give the hose and back support and she was correct. It does need it. Inflating it was a snap and it shoots water very far. You will be surprised how far actually. It's a cool addition to our water toys and I think it will last for years..it's made quite well and seems pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia  Spinosa

customer_reviews.title: Big and fun
customer_reviews.text: The kids at my church really loved this giant dino sprinkler. Good quality. Easy to blow up. The kids thought it was funny the water came from the nose. A nice volume of water. The only thing I wish is that is had some tie downs because if a gust of wind came along then it ended up on its side. It is a little on the pricey side for what you get but it is a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Marcine Wielt

customer_reviews.title: It's a giant unicrn that doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: It was great for a week or so and then it started to deflate. My wife and I have spent way too long looking over every surface and seem for a leak. We've put in underwater, filled it up full and inspected every square inch. We found a few holes on the horn but still it will not hold air long enough to stand up for more than 30 minutes. I didn't expect it to be long-lasting but this was still a disappointment. If you buy it for a single event (e.g. birthday party) you'll be happy. If you want something that will last the summer you'll be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Buck9s

customer_reviews.title: Poor design.
customer_reviews.text: Poorly designed item. The hose that runs inside the horse it too short resulting in a retracted spout and poor spray. With a lot of jury-rigging, we got it to work, it the kids lost interest within a few minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Robin K.

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: Fresh out of the box with a huge hole. Huge letdown.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: seams not secure
customer_reviews.text: when we recieved it the seam was already unglued/split unable to inflate and use. my grand daughter is heart broken
customer_reviews.author: starsAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought for niece. Very cute but kinda expensive. We could not get it to stand up. The customer service of the seller was excellent as they gave us advice but it tilted over so much that it’s is important to note that it won’t stay standing. Even with that.... it was a hit. It’s big which is what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: superme

customer_reviews.title: very fun but easy to put holes in
customer_reviews.text: This was HUGE when inflated and while the kidos (3yo) thought the sprinkler system was too forceful (this may have been due to our own hose and water pressure though) they DID love pushing in over and running into it. Granted we were using it not as directed and more of a punching bag-it did quickly get small holes in it. Considering these were toddlers and we we're exactly MMA fighting with the monster it did seem odd how easily in was punctured. I feel bad for the amount of plastic that seems wasted after only two days of use though.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: What a Hoot ! It's Huge!
customer_reviews.text: My horses love to stand in the water hose on hot days (I usually attach a hose to the fence), but I thought this would be fun as a desensitization tool (horses are scared of everything until they get used to them) as well as a sprinkler to boot. It went great! 😍 Make sure you have an air mattress pump as I tried multiple methods & then just bought one & it was up in 2 minutes. Everything connected easily and it worked great! Will be getting it out on super hot days for sure until the horses kill it 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Pinto Point Photography Review

customer_reviews.title: Wide and far reaching sprinkler, a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Cool looking giant sprinkler. Easy to inflate if you have the right air pump. Manual air pump will take a long time. We used the top of our shop vac to inflate it. It takes seconds with an automatic air pump. It deflates easily and quickly when done using. We’ve used it twice and have left it out for days before deflating and bringing in. I feel like it will hold up well, plastic is thick and seems durable. The sprinkler part is great- a wide far reach. Kids of various ages loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Lumbee

customer_reviews.title: Great for making mud puddles
customer_reviews.text: My kids went bananas for this thing. Mine included stakes to anchor it to the ground, and it came nicely packaged w/o any tears or anything. Some were saying it would deflate w/o being hooked up to the water hose but mine has been inflated for a week now without losing any air.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Big and awesome
customer_reviews.text: We are big Stranger Things fans. We purchased this to let the kids play in the sprinkler, but also as a halloween decoration. It takes a lot of air, but was easy to inflate. The body,, head, and legs all have a place to inflate. The hose was easy to hook up. The weight is in the feet and that helps keep it up. You will want to make sure the legs are inflated fully so it can hold up the weight. It also has some stakes to help keep it planted. The water sprays plenty far. We have enjoyed it so far and can now just hope it can hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Duke

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!! I swear I’ll never buy a product like this again
customer_reviews.text: Bought in March for my daughters unicorn birthday party and 3 days ago I attempted to blow this up as I noticed a hole in the tail I patched it and as for today MY DAUGHTERS BIRTHDAY!!!!! There was a HUGE HOLE running through the seam on the top of this 6ft unicorn. We never got to use it!!! Very heartbroken as it was my only gift to my daughter from myself as I am a single mother!!! It’s very upsetting when a child asks why the “gift” was broken!!!!
customer_reviews.author: rose house

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about inflating this but used my husband’s shop vac that has a reverse air feature. It, literally, takes 30 seconds to fill. Put the stakes in to hold it in place and the giraffe stands up straight and holds steady. The spray coming out is good and my kids have been really having fun with this sprinkler!
customer_reviews.author: kraaigirl

customer_reviews.title: Children’s birthday party ruined!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awful product. Would rather have chosen zero stars. Had a Unicorn themed party and house FULL of children and it was the first time out of the box and there was a GIGANTIC hole in the face of the unicorn directly on the seam. My “return window” was expired and have not even had a chance to use it, ruined birthday party and stole my money!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of humongous fun!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the dinosaur for my 3 year old son! He loves it! Easy to inflate. This thing is huge! My item arrived with 3 stakes to secure in the ground. There are 3 sleeve with holes off the side of each leg and tail to insert the stake. I live in Florida and with the winds we had this didn’t blow around. I was shocked how far and wide the water sprays. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely turn heads!
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing! My kid loves it (and everyone who drives by). The only set back is it is very difficult to inflate. You definitely need to purchase an air pump with different size nozzles because there are 4 different air chambers to fill up on this varying in size.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Ripped 15 minutes into use 1
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, do not purchase. Where the stake goes attached to the foot and tail easy tear ripping a hole in the body of the dinosaur. Before my son even could really play in it, a breeze (hear me, light wind) was able to blow the dino enough to rip that seam and down she went. DO NOT BUY, spend a few more bucks on a better quality one.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Defective Seam
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my son's birthday party, I opened it up last weekend to test it out and there was a large hole in one of the feet where the seam was not connected at all so we were not even able to inflate it. The package was not damaged looks like the seam had never been connected in this area. I would not recommend this seller as they have a horrible return policy & send defective products.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Cain

customer_reviews.title: What a hit!
customer_reviews.text: So this was used mostly as a tackling dummy in all honestly, and ended up on the trampoline to be WWF slammed, but held up incredibly well and was an absolute blast. Would and will buy another one next summer if they still are in business and on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: D DEATLEY

customer_reviews.title: It deflated 5-10 minutes after we inflated it and could not be kept inflated.
customer_reviews.text: It deflated 5-10 minutes after we inflated it. We purchased this unicorn for my daughters 6th birthday party. We inflated it before the party started and it was deflated as the guest arrived and was unable to stay inflated. We were so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jane F Bauer

customer_reviews.title: WELCOME HOME BABY GIRL
customer_reviews.text: I bought this inflatable elephant to welcome my wife and newborn baby girl back home. I inflated it using the shop vac, anchored it to the front yard, and drove the new baby and wife home from the hospital. I feel it was a hit with the wife and the baby, although she is an newborn without the ability to show emotions. I did not use the product as a sprinkler, so I can not speak to its ability to spray water.
customer_reviews.author: James C Coppola

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is huge my daughter is obsessed with unicorns so I has to get this she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: joseph fox

customer_reviews.title: He's a show stopper.
customer_reviews.text: This skunk is easy to blow up. The hose attaches easily to it too. The fun begins when you turn on the water. The water comes out of his tail and actually shots up high enough for an adult to cool off. I put him out on my front lawn to try him out.. My neighbors have gotten a good laugh watching it when I have turned him on.
customer_reviews.author: mary anne villardi

customer_reviews.title: Ripped on the seam before we could use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for her birthday. As we attempted to inflate, we noticed it was not filling with air. Then sadly we saw the 16 inch rip in the seam on the back. My daughter is sad and mad. I’m upset that I spent hard earned money on something we could even use once. Getting a refund would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lulusmum

customer_reviews.title: You could add some longer metal stakes to secure it if you live in a blustery area!
customer_reviews.text: Giant Dino sprinkler fun!!! Very durable!!! The only glitch was the sprinkler head, mounted in dino’s nose had a few openings clogged with particles. My son used an air com-pressure to blow these open and all was well! Worked wonderfully!!! Kids are still enjoying sprinkler fun, and who doesn’t enjoy a cool spray of water during the summer heat!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fran Coffey Harvell

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. I wish water came out if the arms too but it’s ok. I have a hard time making it stand up. For the most part while the hose is attached to the back it kinda keeps it upright but it likes to fall forward. Mostly just paying for the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A Aronhalt

customer_reviews.title: Held air for a day :/
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love this! It’s huge, as advertised! Inflated easily/quickly and our kids were enjoying their new sprinkler. It held air for that day, and by the next morning it had deflated. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: AnnT

customer_reviews.title: Leaked Air
customer_reviews.text: This item leaked the air right out of the box. I inflated it properly, attached the hose and as soon as the hose started running air came out. Amazon did send me paperwork to return the item but I cannot get it back in the box. I am just taking the loss
customer_reviews.author: Andsum

customer_reviews.title: Only Got to Use it Once :(
customer_reviews.text: This product was awful! When we first received it and blew it up, we were thrilled. My three little girls had a blast in it. It’s huge and absolutely adorable. Then, we let it dry really well, deflated it, and rolled it up neatly to store it. Two weeks later. My husband inflated it again. We were very mindful not to put too much air in it. While they were running through the sprinkler outside, it busted and immediately fell apart. Granted, it was a 98 degree day, but for $50, it should be made well enough to withstand the heat, when your children will want to play in it most. We are so bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Driggers

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I use this wonderful thing to water my front lawn my neighbors got to think i am crazy. It does a great job covering a lot of area. only downfall is trying to get it to stay up.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Works well with low water pressure
customer_reviews.text: I really like how this works well with low water pressure , some water toys only work if you have the water on full blast , and it's such a waste of water. But this sprays if you have the water low or high.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and that’s about it
customer_reviews.text: I love this sprinkler and the shipping was fast but it’s too too heavy so when we start to put water into it, it just falls right over because the heads so big!!!! Little disappointed so now we’ll have to rig something up to keep it standing upright!
customer_reviews.author: Heathur

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!  The kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought two of these. The green dino for my nephews and the blue monster for my friends. All the kids are between 3 and 6 years old, and they absolutely LOVE these sprinklers! Neither family reported any problems with blowing them up. Not sure how long they'll last, but the first couple of days have brought the kids so much joy that the purchase is worth it no matter what.
customer_reviews.author: vicki Sherman Doueck

customer_reviews.title: Fun, perfect for backyard party.
customer_reviews.text: Just enough spray for kids to run through without destroying the yard. I had my adult children inflate it with a mattress air pump. Colorful, holds up against wind.
customer_reviews.author: kimbacaffeinate

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t come with pump for inflating
customer_reviews.text: Sprinkler came today, and we had one very excited little boy. Product description says easy to use- attachable to any garden hose. Easy to assemble and no tools required. What it fails to mention is that it does not come with a pump to inflate it. We have a low pressure pump at home so we tried that and it was not the correct size to inflate the t-Rex. Extremely disappointed. I cannot rate the stars for durability yet as we are unable to use it. However we are so frustrated we may just return it and not bother! Not about to spend more money on a pump to blow it up when we already have one.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Big and fun! Feels durable. Whoever designed this is clearly an inflatable enthusiast, and as a collector I apreciate the design and availability of such a toy!
customer_reviews.author: TheFox

customer_reviews.title: Loves it.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our niece for her birthday. She absolutely LOVES it! It’s so tall, haha. Worth every penny in my opinion. They did say the water hose connected to the bottom so it made it a bit difficult for balance or something. But everyone had fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Williams

customer_reviews.title: Damaged in box
customer_reviews.text: Came with a hole in the head- tried to close it up with patch they provided and it wouldn’t stay pumped up had to return, hopefully they send a replacement for this and the new one will work great because my kids were super bummed! It also takes FOREVER to inflate! With a pump it shouldn’t be too bad, but we did not so we improvised and used a leaf blower😂 Once we receive our replacement I will update the review but as of now I have wasted $50!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Easy Fun Water Days!
customer_reviews.text: This was so awesome. My daughter loves this. Even my husband that this was the coolest thing ever. Easy to inflate and just add the hose. 5mins or less. Hours of fun. Want to buy the T Rex for my son. Added a video to review also.
customer_reviews.author: Reesa

customer_reviews.title: My 7-Year Old Great Niece LOVES it!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my -year old great niece's birthday gift. She (and her little brother) absolutely love it! I am very pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Wells II

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This looked like an awesome product for the kids on hot summer day! It’s easy to set up and inflate. If only it lasted more than 30 minutes! Serious design flaw wit anchor spike associated with the seam. On time run in with an 8 year old and large hole was ripped into side, too big to patch. Next time I will just throw $47.99 in the garbage and skip a stop.
customer_reviews.author: terry kinsley

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was much better than we expected! The spray spread at least 10 feet in each direction and my sons LOVED it! Even when we turned the hose down, it was a lot of fun for kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: You can find it cheaper and without mold somewhere else!
customer_reviews.text: This product must have been used because it came with mold on it. Disgusting!!!!! We couldn’t even display it for our daughters party. It’s being returned!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a birthday party. Fun for the kids. Lots of compliments on how cool it is. We actually set it up on the pool deck and used a pool pump to pump water out of the pool to make the sprinkler work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Falls over easily
customer_reviews.text: We only used as decoration for a party and did not use as sprinkler but they kept falling over with the slightest breeze. They need weights in the feet to keep sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: This was great for my grandsons 1st birthday
customer_reviews.text: This was great for my grandsons 1st birthday!! Everyone enjoyed the sprinkler! The only down fall it needed to be fasten down with bungie cord other wise the elephant fell over! Otherwise it was perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Fun Demegorgan sprinkler needs a little support
customer_reviews.text: The kids really enjoyed this and said it was a great sprinkler but it needed support so we propped it up with our decking. After an hour or so it started drooping forward, and loosing air in its arms. The next day it fell over backward and was spraying the opposite direction. Possibly due to the high temperatures outside? For the most part it was very enjoyable and unique.
customer_reviews.author: Sara McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Turns out it’s easy to inflate and seems very durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece-she’s 3 and she loves it! Turns out it’s easy to inflate and seems very durable. One suggestion would be to have a way to weight it down when it’s windy out-maybe built in weights in feet or stakes of some sort-a moderate wind blows it away. Others wise a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Sandry

customer_reviews.title: The kids have a lot of fun with this
customer_reviews.text: The kids have a lot of fun with this. There are two problems. If it’s windy it blows over and the horn doesn’t spray the water correctly because it auctions into itself. So we have to constantly fix it.
customer_reviews.author: LMS

customer_reviews.title: great idea, and placed just off the deck it ...
customer_reviews.text: great idea, and placed just off the deck it mists the deck and gives a cooling down to the area- however.....IT NEEDS WEIGHTED FEET! It does NOT stand very well and would benefit from weights in the feet to keep it in place- OR tied down hooks on the side so you can ratchet it to the ground!- it falls over A LOT!! we actually are using a small toddler slide to hold it up!
customer_reviews.author: Katie T.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy??
customer_reviews.text: Sent this to my grandkids down south and it didnt seem to hold up well to two little boys wanting to play. Kept folding and bowing forward. Was hoping for better.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Came ripped
customer_reviews.text: I unfolded it this morning to be used at my son’s birthday party. The foot was ripped so I was unable to determine if it was easy to inflate. Certainly not durable.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Do not inflate inside🙄
customer_reviews.text: My grandson just loves his dinosaur. Hours of fun play.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B. Guerriero

customer_reviews.title: Have a big compressor to fill it
customer_reviews.text: My kids party this was the biggest hit. with a breeze it gave us a nice mist too, great for a hot day
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Fun but work...
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to blow up and doesn’t stay well if there is some wind, but overall super fun and the kids love!
customer_reviews.author: mom of boys

customer_reviews.title: Sparkle the Unicorn
customer_reviews.text: So much fun. My grand-daughter loves it. We have it next to our inground pool sprinkling water in the pool while we swim. My grand daughter is turning three next week and she wants it at her birthday party. She is named sprakle.
customer_reviews.author: deborah

customer_reviews.title: Dud!
customer_reviews.text: Was excited about the product when I first got it. After the first day of inflation, i loved it. Next day i could already tell it was deflating. I originally thought that I had failed to tighten the caps where you inflate. To this date it still only stays inflated for a day. The kids love it but it has to be re-inflated every day.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Johnson

customer_reviews.title: THING IS A BEAST!!
customer_reviews.text: STILL have it and working perfectly! Thing is huge and sprays far and everywhere! Buy some stakes and stake it down though!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Fun sprinkler but ripped easily
customer_reviews.text: Great kids sprinkler. Only issue is that it rips easily. Make sure your kids don’t start grabbing at it. Otherwise a very fun toy.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Seam blew wide open! Sad kids and ripped Unicorn
customer_reviews.text: Seam split after 2 uses.... was careful not to overinflate, but seem popped while it was standing with water running through. Not sure how to contact seller to seek resolution, but only used twice so not too impressed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kirk

customer_reviews.title: So fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this! There are several areas to inflate so that was a bit of a pain. The feet are weighted and you can stake it to the ground so it’s pretty stable.
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyMarie

customer_reviews.title: Popped after using it 3 times
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 4 year olds birthday. She loved it, but it popped after 3 times of using it, the seam split so there is no way to repair it. My 4 year old was devastated.
customer_reviews.author: taylor williams

customer_reviews.title: Unicorns are FUN!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim, thinking it would be for the kids but really, I use this just as much as children. It is durable for the kids and easy to inflate while easy to pack away. This was the best decision!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Nerini

customer_reviews.title: It worked great to start with then the sprinkler part messed up ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked great to start with then the sprinkler part messed up and the water was going into the unicorn instead of coming out of the horn. However we did enjoy it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Unpacked and inflated it. It looks amazing and seems high quality but, not even 10 minutes into playing with it and it began to deflate. Found that one of the seams had a tear in it. It is pretty sad that we are patching it up less than an hour after opening the box. Don’t buy unless you purchase gorilla tape as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ball Family

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was the star of my neighborhood at Halloween!!! kids that were dressed like this posed for it lol looking forward for summertime btw home depot sells easy yard stakes to help prop it up
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Lasted through a few major storms with no issues
customer_reviews.text: Reviews had me thinking it would fall apart quick but complete opposite it’s lasted through the summer storms only complaint is directions in box weren’t clear on which is the part to fill with air
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for her birthday. Though it is gigantic, it took less than ten mins to inflate. I was skeptical about the sprinkler part, but it stayed upright and sprayed the water very well. The horn is a little heavy, so there is some sagging, but perhaps mine just needed to be better inflated. It did not affect the use at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute and the kids love it because it’s big. But it doesn’t spit out much water for as big it is.
customer_reviews.author: Snidera62

customer_reviews.title: So Much Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My family absolutely loves this thing! We have so much fun playing in the sprinkler and it's so huge! We love this so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Marshall

customer_reviews.title: It's cute and works well, haven't had it blow ...
customer_reviews.text: It's cute and works well, haven't had it blow around yet, the reason for the 3 stars is because after receiving, I saw it at Target for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Barkley

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your time
customer_reviews.text: The size is great but sprayer is hardly a trickle. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold the inflate
customer_reviews.text: Great idea: fun: didn't hold the inflate for more than a few minutes. We tried to find the "leak" : had it in the pool to see the "bubbles" from said "leak", but there were none. Very frustrating as it was for a kids Memorial Day picnic.
customer_reviews.author: "tjhcsw"

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this ! If u have a electric air pump it blows up great and it came with 3 stick to hold it down in place.
customer_reviews.author: miranda

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 9 year old niece for her birthday. I am aunt of the year and also.... now i want one for myself lol
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Unicorn 🦄
customer_reviews.text: My grand baby had been enjoying thru these pandemic times 😊
customer_reviews.author: Michelle miller

customer_reviews.title: Ginormous
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge. Scared the crap out of my 18 month old nephew but the kids who were a little older loved it.
customer_reviews.author: V. HILIOS

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my niece and she loved it .. was very well made and set up easily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for parties
customer_reviews.text: Dont overthink it- this is the best for any giraffe lover!
customer_reviews.author: genevieve davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to inflate, I did use something to prop it up to add stability. Kids loved it
customer_reviews.author: W S

customer_reviews.title: What are you waiting for?
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged in a Stranger Things box so easily giftable. Blew it up with our compressor, had it staked down and hooked up to the hose in a matter of minutes. Stakes were included. It covers about 10 yards nicely/evenly. Kid and dog approved! Can’t attest to durability yet but the material seems solid.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Unicorn filled with water which uoh cant get out of it - our grand daughters used it once and when one touched the horn where the water came out - the horn literally broke. Super horrible waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandchildren love it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as anticipated. Grandchildren love it. Easy fill and anchor. Sprays wide, long area if turn water up.
customer_reviews.author: AM Grump

customer_reviews.title: Okayy.
customer_reviews.text: Looks cool doesn’t squirt as much water as I would have thought. Kids liked it for a day then picked it up an they haven’t played with it since. Price is a little high also.
customer_reviews.author: Blake R

product_meta.title: BigMouth Inc. Ginormous Inflatable Magical Unicorn Summer Yard Sprinkler, Stands Over 6 Feet Tall, Perfect for Summer Fun
feature_bullets: BIG FUN: This huge, inflatable unicorn yard sprinkler stands over 6 feet tall! The magical design and easy use makes this great to own or to give as a fun gift.
STAY COOL: An inflatable sprinkler is a fun and safe way for the whole family to cool off in summer from the comfort of your backyard. Hours of outdoor summertime fun are just minutes away!
CONVENIENT: This fun unicorn sprinkler is easy to use! Simply connect it to any regular-sized garden hose. It’s easy to set up, take down, and stores nicely in a 18" x 3" x 15" box.
SAFETY-TESTED: Made of PVC; this sprinkler is sturdy and safe for the whole family.
ORIGINAL: Sold by BigMouth Inc—the leading name in inflatable summer fun toys! to make a splash at your next outdoor party.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,078 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
